int64_t wait

Detailed Description

Decrease the learning rate by a fixed proportion when validation error stops improving.

Definition at line 96 of file lbann_callback_learning_rate.hpp.

Decrease the learning rate by amt if accuracy does not improve for patience epochs.

Member Function Documentation

float lbann::lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate::schedule ( model *  m,
Layer *  l 
) [protected, virtual]

This is called every epoch to potentially update the learning rate.

Parameters:
m The model being trained.
l The layer in the model currently being potentially updated.
Returns:
A new learning rate.

Implements lbann::lbann_callback_learning_rate.

Definition at line 101 of file lbann_callback_learning_rate.cpp.

00101                                                                    {
00102   DataType cur_acc = m->get_test_accuracy();
00103   float cur_lr = l->get_optimizer()->get_learning_rate();
00104   if (cur_acc > last_acc) {
00105     last_acc = cur_acc;
00106     wait = 0;
00107   } else {
00108     if (wait >= patience) {
00109       if (is_last_layer(l)) {
00110         wait = 0;
00111         last_acc = cur_acc;
00112       }
00113       return cur_lr * amt;
00114     } else {
00115       if (is_last_layer(l)) {
00116         ++wait;
00117       }
00118     }
00119   }
00120   return cur_lr;
00121 }
